verseComparisons.localText: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth.
verseComparisons.expectedText: In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth.

verseComparisons.localText: For God so loved the world, that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish, but have eternal life.
verseComparisons.expectedText: For God so loved the world, that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish, but have eternal life.

verseComparisons.localText:
Yahweh is my shepherd:
I shall lack nothing.
verseComparisons.expectedText: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.

verseComparisons.localText:
“Blessed are the poor in spirit,
for theirs is the Kingdom of Heaven.
verseComparisons.expectedText: Blessed are the poor in spirit; for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

verseComparisons.localText:
He who testifies these things says,
“Yes, I come quickly.”

Amen! Yes, come, Lord Jesus.
verseComparisons.expectedText: He who testifies these things says, "Yes, I come quickly." Amen! Yes, come, Lord Jesus.
